title.desktop:
Join our team and help artists
turn their passion into
successful careers.

description.desktop: We want to work with pioneers who have a passion for music, can solve challenging problems, and want to make a real impact on helping artists reach their fans.

qualities.title: Hard workers
qualities.description: You do what it takes to get the job done, getting out what you put into it.

qualities.title: Self motivators
qualities.description: You have the drive to push yourself, the team and the company forward.

qualities.title: Problem solvers
qualities.description: When things get challenging, you focus on finding solutions.

qualities.title: Team players
qualities.description: You value others abilities and contributions, allowing others to work together towards our common goals.

qualities.title: Creative thinkers
qualities.description: You have the aptitude to be creative and entrepreneurial in how you approach your work.

description.desktop: We are always open to connecting with people who believe in our mission and eager to join the team.
